creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: four lines of calligraphy; fifth line of smaller characters at L, with larger characters forming signature at LL; bold rectangular red seal at URC; red seal LLC
markings: URC, red relief seal; LLC, red relief seal; on back, in pencil: [Kikuchi Sankei / Meiji Scholar / dated 1880]; and on back, at left edge, in pencil, Japanese writing
title: Poem on Peach Blossoms
